firstSection.description: We turn waste into valuable resources, driving Saudi Arabia’s path to zero carbon emissions by 2060. Discover our sustainable solutions in recycling and biogas production for a cleaner, greener future.

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.description1: TAQATCO is a leading innovator in sustainable waste management, committed to transforming waste into valuable resources. Our mission is to drive Saudi Arabia's journey towards zero carbon emissions by 2060, aligning with the 'Green Saudi Initiative.'
aboutUs.description2: Specializing in municipal solid waste recycling, we convert waste into biogas and organic fertilizers, reducing reliance on landfills and promoting a circular economy. Our processes adhere to internationally recognized standards, ensuring safety, efficiency, and environmental protection.
aboutUs.description3: At TAQATCO, we are dedicated to creating a cleaner, greener future for Saudi Arabia, turning waste into wealth and contributing to a sustainable society.

missionVision.missionDescription: To provide innovative and environmentally safe waste recycling solutions that reduce carbon emissions, protect natural resources, and support the 'Green Saudi Initiative,' all while delivering economic value and promoting sustainability across the Kingdom.
missionVision.visionDescription: To be the leading force in sustainable waste management, transforming waste into valuable resources, and driving Saudi Arabia's journey towards a zero-carbon future, while contributing to a thriving circular economy.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to promoting sustainable practices that protect and preserve our environment for future generations.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace innovation to drive advancements in waste management and circular economy practices.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the power of partnerships with the community, industry, and government to achieve our goals.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We uphold the highest standards of integrity in all our operations and interactions.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: We take responsibility for the impact of our actions on society and the environment, striving to create positive change.

enhanceEnvironmentalSustainability.title: Enhance Environmental Sustainability
enhanceEnvironmentalSustainability.description: Lead waste recycling initiatives to support Saudi Arabia's environmental goals.

reduceCarbonFootprint.title: Reduce Carbon Footprint
reduceCarbonFootprint.description: Drive efforts toward achieving zero carbon emissions by 2060.

promoteCircularEconomy.title: Promote Circular Economy
promoteCircularEconomy.description: Transform waste into valuable resources to reduce landfill dependence.

fosterInnovation.title: Foster Innovation
fosterInnovation.description: Develop cutting-edge recycling technologies aligned with global standards.

supportEconomicDiversification.title: Support Economic Diversification
supportEconomicDiversification.description: Contribute to the growth of the green economy in Saudi Arabia.

empowerCommunities.title: Empower Communities
empowerCommunities.description: Create sustainable job opportunities and raise environmental awareness.

municipalSolidWasteRecycling.title: Municipal Solid Waste Recycling
municipalSolidWasteRecycling.description: Advanced processes to convert waste into valuable resources, reducing landfill usage.

metalAndScrapRecycling.title: Metal and Scrap Recycling
metalAndScrapRecycling.description: Specialized recycling of various scrap materials, including metals, to promote resource recovery and sustainability.

biogasProduction.title: Biogas Production
biogasProduction.description: Generation of renewable energy from organic waste through anaerobic digestion.

organicFertilizerProduction.title: Organic Fertilizer Production
organicFertilizerProduction.description: Conversion of waste into high-quality organic fertilizers for agricultural use.

environmentalConsulting.title: Environmental Consulting
environmentalConsulting.description: Expert guidance on sustainable waste management practices and regulatory compliance.

wasteManagementSolutions.title: Waste Management Solutions
wasteManagementSolutions.description: Tailored solutions for businesses and municipalities to manage and reduce waste effectively.
